law.history: Repealed 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 501, sec. 6, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 154, sec. 27, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 165, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 475, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1994. -- Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 494, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1986.
